definition: an iron spike attached to the shoe to prevent slipping on ice when walking or climbing
details:
noun
- an iron spike attached to the shoe to prevent slipping on ice when walking or climbing
= synonyms: crampoon
- someone who climbs as a sport
- someone who ascends on foot
= synonyms: mounter
- someone seeking social prominence by obsequious behavior
= synonyms: social climber
- a vine or climbing plant that readily grows up a support or over other plants
